Anyone looking to buy the game, just wait and see if crashing and disconnect get fixed first. I loved this game, but right now there stuff that HAS to be fixed

The games bugs and crash issues have been happening for a while, and hasn't been touched up. Survivor perk pool in pretty small (you see the same perks in most games). The scoring system change wasn't the greatest idea, it does take a lot more in game actions, however I think the intent was so people that do nothing don't get rewarded so I kinda see why that was done, just wasn't the best way to do it. 

I won't get started on the latest couple of killers they have released, all I will say I do not find them fun to play against. But I will say as someone who players more killer than survivor. The killers life is getting pretty easy these days, excluding gen rushing. however it is still playable.

The most recent update have made this game a hit and miss sort of game, This crashes, disconnects and other common bugs really need to be fixed.

Loading screen crashes have been going on for 3+ months now and games often start 3v1 or even 2v1 instead of 4v1 like it should be. Instead of fixing this issue they let it go and after the new chapter released now we have a bug that if you manage to actually make it through the loading screen then theres a chance you crash out as soon as you get into the game. The new matchmaking they rolled out recently is complete garbage.

 Before it was easy to get into a lobby with <150 ping now you have to dodge anywhere from 5-10 300+ ping lobbies just to find a playable one and then someone leaves and you get stuck with YET ANOTHER BUG. Often times when the lobby is full and someone leaves the lobby will bug out and won't try to find a 4th survivor meaning the game will never start and everyone has to leave and reque and hope it doesn't happen again. To add to the matchmaking point I have seen rank 10-12 survivors going against a rank 20 killer with one perk. (Rank 20 is the starting rank and rank 1 is the highest.) The reverse is also true seeing rank 1-4 killers against rank 15-20 survivors. 

And you can forget about playing with friends (which is what makes this game fun) because theres a really high chance that at least one of you will crash out and not get to play that round.

The game used to be fun and its always had a few bugs but with these making the game unplayable you would think it would be a all hands on deck for the devs but hey we have a new killer and survivor we can't play because we can't make it into the game.

Gott, habe ich das Spiel mal geliebt.
Dieses Game hatte zur Anfang seine Goldene Zeit.
Mittlerweile verkommt dieses Spiel zu seinem fetten, stinkenden und unspielbaren Misthaufen.
Hier wird auf Quantität statt auf Qualität gesetzt.
Immer mehr Killer, immer mehr Survivor und immer mehr Perks werden nachgeschoben, statt das Spiel
endlich mal zu balancen. Bei diesem Spiel wird man das Gefühl nicht los, das die Entwickler ihren eigenen Misthaufen nie selbst gespielt haben und Planlos weitere DLC's integrieren. Hauptsache Geld machen.
Das führt natürlich dazu das die Killerspezifischen Fähigkeiten sich unfair mit weiteren Perks kombinieren lassen.
Hier wird anscheinend nicht vorher auf solche möglichen Kombos geachtet.

Dann kommen natürlich diese ganzen Trollköpfe und meinen :" Ja, aber man kann alle Killer mit einem jeweiligen Perk kontern." Klar geht das, doch leider habe ich nur 4 Slots frei und weiß nicht vorher gegen welchen Killer ich antrete.
Deshalb ist es eigentlich am schlausten all-a-rounder Fähigkeiten mitzunehmen. 
Auf den Rängen 10 - 1 finden sich oft nur noch Killer mit: Fluch Ruin ( was das Spiel zu einem qäulenden search and destroy macht ) und Niemand entrinnt dem Tod. 
Aber ich entrinne jetzt dem Spiel und deinstalliere, also tschö!

Сейчас польются помои . Если вы посмотрев стримеров или нарезок , решили купить ЭТО , то мой отзыв тут , чтобы остановить вас . Начнем :1 - наиужаснейший неткод , хит-боксы непонятно вообще кто делал . Маньяк делает удар в метре от тебя , а удар засчитывает . И нет , с интернетом и пингом у меня всё отлично , а вот с игрой нет . 
2 - поиск игры . Если вы купили ИГРУ , чтобы ИГРАТЬ , то это не та страница стима . Здесь из раздела игр , максимум симулятор ожидания , ибо игру вам не найдут . А даже если найдут , вероятность того , что она не загрузится стремиться к бесконечности . Есть ещё некоторые спорные моменты , но этих должно быть достаточно, чтобы отговорить вас от покупки. 
Сама игра нравиться , вот только в неё не поиграть .
На данный момент мой отзыв имеет мало общего с реальностью, в игру играть возможно, но комьюнити оставляет желать лучше, как и ранговая система

I have 1.5k hours as of writing this. The game has become too bad for me to recommend, the killer ques are seconds while the survivor ques can take much longer. This is in in part due to killer games feeling much more taxing, try hard, and competitive while survivor games feel more relaxed, rewarding, and fun. Thanks to the dev's mind set years ago of a competitive game and focus on the killer vs survivor experience the matches feel more like 1vs4 survivors instead of 1vs1 team. Most killers in high mmr are now only the top tier killers (Nurse and Spirit along with a few others) running only meta builds instead of the now 27 killers on the roster. This has lead the survivor experience to only see those killers and be filled with tunneling and camping. These revelations had come to me from filling out the post game survey where I tried to play both sides equally. Sadly I am not alone in this now as even the top level streamers admit that a team of highest level survivors will consistently beat a highest level killer. All of this has lead to the player base dropping by one or two thousand every month with only 32k remaining according to steam charts. I hope the game improves in the future but currently it is not looking up. I loved this game with all my heart but I cannot recommend anyone new buy the game for these reasons.

Не покупайте игру! Вы просто не сможете в неё нормально поиграть. из 10 игр запускается максимум 3-4 в лучшем случае, остальные вылетает с ошибкой сети NAT. А разрабы просто закрывают глаза и делают вид будто нет такой проблемы, видимо по причине неспособности устранить данную проблему. С каждыми патчами все больше и больше багов появляется. Ввели архивы за деньги, все покупают, но починить элементарно саму игру не хотят. Обходите стороной этот мусор.

Matchmaking has become wildly inconsistent with the addition of crossplay. The toxic gameplay feedback loops are still around but possibly even worse than ever - killers are encouraged to tunnel, camp and make the game unfun for survivors because otherwise they'll get punished by getting gen rushed. The average survivor is brain dead because the mechanics of the game are fairly brain dead for the survivor side. The strength of the perks also vary wildly, and although skill plays a lot into how you perform at the mid-tier ranks, if a killer is going to tunnel you, you better have the best fucking perks in the game to slow down his tunneling efforts because otherwise you're basically screwed. And again, the game encourages camping and tunneling because it is very, very strong; do not blame people for maximizing their advantages with their play style and perk choices.

This game is heading rapidly downhill.  BHVR are flogging this cash-cow for all its worth since they bought the publishing rights (and since Deathgarden was a complete flop).  One DLC every few months and masses of purchasable skins might be okay if they actually did anything about the fundamental bugs in the game.  But they don't - they just introduce more.

The game crashes regularly during loading in to a game.  REGULARLY.  And rather than work on this game ruining experience which has been going on for weeks?  BHVR throw out another DLC.

Ranking is straight up broken.  Before the latest DLC it was too easy.  Now it's way too difficult.  I get that rank should mean something, but it shouldn't also encourage the worst gameplay tendencies to achieve it - tunnelling, camping, farming, chain-blinding - not fun.

Matchmaking is busted.   Not having a ping limit in matchmaking means getting players with horrible pings.  In a game like this, that's stupid.  The solution?  Dodge lobbies to avoid bad pings and keep waiting.   And you probably will get matched against players 10 ranks apart from you.  Despite waiting 5 minutes for a game.  Players with different experience levels in an asymmetric game leads to one side getting stomped on.  Not fun.

Players disconnect a lot.  Keeping an item, rage quitting when they get outplayed, just de-ranking to bully new players - as long as they only do it once every 4 or 5 matches, then apparently it's all fine.  Never mind that the other players in the game had to wait to get in the game,  risk crashing during the load, waste offerings, and now have to play through a mismatched game. 

The grind is insane.  I get that BHVR want people to keep playing.  But if their plan is to keep releasing new content, then that should be enough to keep people playing - not a ridiculous grind.  There are nearly 60 killer perks, requiring three levels each.  Meaning a player, to max out one killer, has to go through around 170 blood webs.  And there are fifteen killers as of today, with one getting added every few months.  Fun.  Don't get your heart set on getting all the perks any time soon.

Every patch introduces more bugs than fixes.  PTR is used just to build hype with streamers instead of actually testing things.  If It was for testing, then Legion would never have been released - a killer who basically bypasses every basic gameplay mechanic in the game in a completely un-fun way.  Not sure who's smart idea that was.  Probably one of the ex-Deathgarden developers.

This game is still fun... someof the time.  But it gets more frustrating every patch.
